comment:
Strong Oak In The Nose. I Like That!
The Delay Taste Is like You Have Soap In Your Mouth! A Hint Of Burnt Plastic.

Light color
Medium heat
Strange unique flavor that I'm not loving
The lingering after taste is awful
Almost a sherry finished taste, like a highland scotch.
Very astringent, tastes like an old pencil eraser.
From the first sip of this stuff, I’ve been a fan. I don’t have the great ability to explain what I’m tasting, but I am strictly a bourbon drinker and I love this one.
Notes of caramel and black cherry on the nose.  Smooth with slight leather, good mouth feel. Lasting bite that finishes well with smokey, peatey undertones.

I was delightful surprised with this. Lighter in color than a typical bourbon but very smooth. Slightly sweet on the front end and I got a slight char flavor
on the back end. Good bang for the buck on this one!
Very unique bourbon. Reminds me of a scotch. Actually smooth but has a strong white wine taste to it.
Less of a bourbon, more of a scotch.
